fr.inria.papart.procam.camera

Class CaptureIpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PImage
      • processing.video.Capture
        • fr.inria.papart.procam.camera.CaptureIpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, processing.core.PConstants

    public class CaptureIpl
extends processing.video.Capture
implements processing.core.PConstants
    Author:
    jeremylaviole The same as Capture, except that the read method also copies the image into an IplImage.
